text: Jilani: “Ana nansalile yambone nnope kumpunda yalakweyo? Wandu wan’jogwepe (Allah), akwete kupata kwa M’mbuje gwao (Allah) Matimbe ga ku Mbepo, gasikujilima cha pasi pakwe sulo, chakawe wandamo mwalakwemo, ni (kupata) achiwammakwao waswejesyedwe, ni chinonyelo chakuumila kwa Allah, sano Allah ni Jwakwalolechesya achikapolo (Wakwe).”
